Classes in vsip::impl

Lvalue_proxy

The generic lvalue proxy class.

Lvalue_proxy<std::complex<T>,Block,Dim>

Lvalue proxy specialization for complex.

Proxy_lvalue_factory

Proxy_lvalue_factory takes an arbitrary Block and generates Lvalue_proxy instances from it.

True_lvalue_factory

True_lvalue_factory takes a Block that implements impl_ref(), and generates true lvalues from it by applying that function.

Structs in vsip::impl::lvalue_detail

Modify_operators

A mix-in template which provides +=, -=, *=, /= operators for any class T that defines T::value_type, conversion to T::value_type, and conversion or assignment from T::value_type.
